# init(frame:)

**Initializer**

Creates a switch control.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor init(frame: CGRect)
```

## Parameters

- **frame**: A rectangle defining the frame of the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UISwitch] object. The size components of this rectangle are ignored.

## Return Value

An initialized [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UISwitch] object.

## Discussion

[doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UISwitch] overrides [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIView/init(frame:)] and enforces a size appropriate for the control.

## Creating a switch

- **init(coder:)**: Creates a switch control from data in an unarchiver.
